languages.text: "Да. И в том беда, что грозит мне. В силах ли ты понять, о чем я говорю? Предан{mf||а} ли ты своей стезе так же, как я — собственной?" {n}Кибелла прищуривается, изучая вас взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да. И в том беда, что грозит мне. В силах ли ты понять, о чем я говорю? Предан{mf||а} ли ты своей стезе так же, как я предана собственной?" {n}Кибелла прищуривается, пристально изучая вас взглядом.{/n}

languages.text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да. И в том беда, что грозит мне. В силах ли ты понять, о чем я говорю? Предан{mf||а} ли ты своей стезе так же, как я — собственной?" {n}Кибелла прищуривается, изучая вас взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yes. I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you, even? Are you as devoted to your way as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

"Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

languages.text: "Ja. Und genau das ist der Niedergang, mit dem ich konfrontiert bin. Begreift Ihr nicht, was ich Euch sage? Könnt Ihr es überhaupt verstehen? Seid Ihr Eurem Faden ebenso verschrieben wie ich dem meinen?" {n}Kibellah mustert dich aus zusammengekniffenen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Und genau das ist der Niedergang, mit dem ich konfrontiert bin. Begreift Ihr nicht, was ich Euch sage? Könnt Ihr es überhaupt verstehen? Seid Ihr Eurem Faden ebenso verschrieben wie ich dem meinen?" {n}Kibellah mustert dich aus zusammengekniffenen Augen.{/n}

languages.text: «Así es. Y ese es el problema al que me enfrento. ¿No ves lo que intento decirte? ¿Lo entiendes, siquiera? ¿Eres tan fiel a tu hilo como lo soy yo al mío?». {n}Kibellah entrecierra los ojos, analizándote.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Y ese es el problema al que me enfrento. ¿No ves lo que intento decirte? ¿Lo entiendes, siquiera? ¿Eres tan fiel a tu hilo como lo soy yo al mío?». {n}Kibellah entrecierra los ojos, analizándote.{/n}

languages.text: 「ええ、そうよ。そして、それこそが私が直面している破滅なの。私が言っていることがわからない？そもそも理解できている？私と同じように、あなたも自分の糸に固執しているの？」{n}キベラは目を細め、あなたを探るように見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、そうよ。そして、それこそが私が直面している破滅なの。私が言っていることがわからない？そもそも理解できている？私と同じように、あなたも自分の糸に固執しているの？」{n}キベラは目を細め、あなたを探るように見る。{/n}

languages.text: “没错，我就是这么情绪化，而这就是我面临的困境。你是无法理解我的意思吗？你真的能理解吗？你也像我一样，全心全意地沿着你的丝线前进吗？”{n}绮贝菈眯起眼睛，打量着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，我就是这么情绪化，而这就是我面临的困境。你是无法理解我的意思吗？你真的能理解吗？你也像我一样，全心全意地沿着你的丝线前进吗？”{n}绮贝菈眯起眼睛，打量着你。{/n}

languages.text: « En effet. Tel est mon fardeau. Ne comprenez-vous pas ce que j'essaye de vous dire ? Le pouvez-vous seulement ? Êtes-vous aussi {mf|dévoué|dévouée} à votre fil que je le suis au mien ? » {n}Kibellah plisse les yeux et vous observe attentivement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Tel est mon fardeau. Ne comprenez-vous pas ce que j'essaye de vous dire ? Le pouvez-vous seulement ? Êtes-vous aussi {mf|dévoué|dévouée} à votre fil que je le suis au mien ? » {n}Kibellah plisse les yeux et vous observe attentivement.{/n}

languages.text: "Evet, öyle. Bu da mücadele ettiğim çöküşün ta kendisi. Sana söylemeye çalıştığım şeyi anlamıyor musun? Hatta onu anlayabilir misin? Sen de benim kadar kendi ipliğine sadık mısın?" {n}Kibellah, gözlerini kısarak seni inceliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, I am. And that is the very downfall I am facing. Do you not understand what I'm telling you? Can you even understand? Are you as devoted to your thread as I am to mine?" {n}Kibellah narrows her eyes, studying you.{/n}
